effects.name: Master Rune of Dismay (Permanent)
effects.description: Can only be inscribed on a war horn. When horn Engraved with this Rune is sounded, all enemies within 48 yards of the user must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or suffer a Stunned Condition. Activation takes an Action and can only be used once per Encounter.

scriptData.label: Master Rune of Dismay (Permanent)

effects.name: Master Rune of Dismay (Temporary)
effects.description: Can only be inscribed on a war horn. When horn Engraved with this Rune is sounded, all enemies within 48 yards of the user must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or suffer a Stunned Condition. Activation takes an Action and can only be used once per Encounter. Can only be activated once.

scriptData.label: Master Rune of Dismay (Temporary)

effects.name: Master Rune of Balance (Permanent)
effects.description: Can be used only by Runesmiths. A single Spellcaster within 48 yards gains a -20 modifier to all Casting and Channeling Tests for Runesmith's Willpower Bonus rounds. Rune cannot be activated again while it's effect is still in place.

scriptData.label: Apply Master Rune of Balance
Effect of Master Rune of Balance

effects.name: Master Rune of Balance (Temporary)
effects.description: Can be used only by Runesmiths. A single Spellcaster within 48 yards gains a -20 modifier to all Casting and Channeling Tests for Runesmith's Willpower Bonus rounds. Rune cannot be activated again while it's effect is still in place. Can only be activated once.

scriptData.label: Apply Master Rune of Balance
Effect of Master Rune of Balance

effects.name: Master Rune of Spite (Permanent)
effects.description: Talisman Engraved with this Rune reduced damage from incoming attacks by 2. Works even against attacks that normally ignore Armour.

scriptData.label: Master Rune of Spite (Permanent)
scriptData.script:
let name = game.i18n.localize('Forien.Armoury.Runes.MasterRuneOfSpite.name');

args.modifiers.other.push({key: "master-rune-of-spite", label: name, value: -2})

effects.name: Master Rune of Spite (Temporary)
effects.description: Talisman Engraved with this Rune reduced damage from incoming attacks by 2. Works even against attacks that normally ignore Armour. Lasts 1 minute.

scriptData.label: Master Rune of Spite (Temporary)
scriptData.script:
let name = game.i18n.localize('Forien.Armoury.Runes.MasterRuneOfSpite.name');

args.modifiers.other.push({key: "master-rune-of-spite", label: name, value: -2})

scriptData.label: Activate Master Rune of Spite
